nodes.text: This is where Joel said I could find the map. Hmm... it doesn't appear to be locked. That seems... odd.
There's something odd about the lock and the latch, though...
It's trapped! So why would Sosi trap his own wardrobe?
Oh. Duh. It's a trap.
Trap or no trap - I still have to get that map.
He must have brought this wardrobe with him from Sicilia. The furniture design from there is so... snakey.
With the trap disabled, the wardrobe feels like it's been defanged.
Now that I have the map, I'd better get out of here before Sosi comes back.
At least I can get the map without risk of death now!
Still, this is a little anticlimatic. Maybe some lightning bolts on the sides could liven it up.
Yep, looks like the trap is still there. Dang. I was hoping it would've disarmed itself by now.
The more I stare at this wardrobe, the more I question "Why am I staring at this wardrobe?"
That's why Sosi doesn't lock his wardrobe. He set a nice little trap instead.
Good thing I've been working on my Rogue skills; disabling this one should be no trouble at all.
Got it!
Uh oh!
It looks like there's some kind of trap on the wardrobe, but I can't figure out how to disarm it.
Let's see what happens if I cut this wire...
... Uh oh...
Let's hope this trap doesn't disarm me... I'm pretty attached to my arms.
These are a few of Sosi's favorite things? Hmm, it's almost completely empty...
Except for this treasure map! So Sosi really was the one who stole it from Katie...
There! What did I tell you? Shawn O'Conner has been breaking into rooms throughout this castle.
Conner - you stupid fool!
Looks like you should have minded your own business and stayed out of mine. Tonight you'll be in the gutter again where you belong.
My office - Immediately!
Good riddance.
Arghh!!

Whenever you do dangerous doings...
Like breaking in and stealing wealth
Or tripping traps or getting caught
Make sure that you are at full health.

nodes.message: Hiding the wardrobe here so we cover up the transition

nodes.text: I'm lucky to be alive.
